required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of AL2846 Capsules in Chinese Patients With Type I Neurofibromatosis
clinical_study.official_title: Phase Ib Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of AL2846 Capsules in Chinese Patients With Type I Neurofibromatosis (Neurofibromatosis and Malignant Peripheral Nerve Sheath Tumors)

lead_sponsor.agency: Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: AL2846 is a multi-target receptor tyrosine kinase inhibitor. The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of AL2846 capsules in Chinese patients with type I neurofibromatosis (NF1) (neurofibromas and malignant peripheral nerve sheath tumors).

primary_outcome.description: The occurrence of all adverse events (AEs), serious adverse events (SAEs) and treatment-related adverse events (TEAEs)
Percentage of participants achieving complete response (CR) and partial response (PR).

secondary_outcome.description: recommended dose of Phase II clinical trial
PFS defined as the time from randomization until the first documented progressive disease (PD) or death from any cause.
The time when the participants first achieved complete or partial remission to disease progression.
Rate of patients with PFS reaching one year among all patients
From date of first administration of test drug until the date of death from any cause
Self-report of pain in target tumor and other parts of body

secondary_outcome.measure: Quality of life related scale（European Organization for the Research and Treatment of Cancer Quality of Life Questionnaire version 3.0, EORTC QLQ-C30(V3)）
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaires about the quality of life (including mental state, appetite state, sleep, etc.)

secondary_outcome.measure: The patient's overall impression of the severity of symptoms (self-report)
secondary_outcome.description: Self-report on the severity of tumor pain, overall pain status, and tumor-related problems other than pain (vision, hearing, mobility, hearing, appearance, etc.)

clinical_study.condition: Neurofibromatosis and Malignant Peripheral Nerve Sheath Tumors

arm_group.description: During the dose escalation phase, patients enrolled in the group will first receive a single fasting administration（AL2846 capsules 120-150mg，oral）. The observation period is 3 days. If dose-limited toxity (DLT) does not occur, they will continue to receive multiple consecutive fasting administrations (120mg-150mg，once a day，oral ),every 28 days as a treatment cycle. During the dose expansion phase, patients will receive multiple consecutive fasting administrations (AL2846 capsules，120mg-150mg, oral ), every 28 days as a treatment cycle.

intervention.description: AL2846 is a multi-target receptor tyrosine kinase inhibitor.

facility.name: Shanghai Ninth People's Hospital, School of Medicine, Shanghai JiaoTong University
